shellshocker

Interface Location

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bomb, Boss, Boundary, Box, DoorOpener, Doors, ElectricBounds, Enemy, EnemySprite, Explosion, Mine, Platforms, Ragnar, Reactor, SmartEnemy, Tower

    public interface Location
    Interface that, when implemented, creates methods that relate to objects on a coordinate plane. These objects will have a position and dimensions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics window)
      Draws the object in the specified Graphics context.
      int getLength()
      Returns the horizontal length of the size of the object.
      int getWidth()
      Returns the vertical width of the size of the object.
      int getXPos()
      Returns the x-coordinate of the location of the object.
      int getYPos()
      Returns the y-coordinate of the location of the object.

    • Method Detail

      • getXPos

        int getXPos()
        Returns the x-coordinate of the location of the object.
        Returns:
        an integer that represents the x-coordinate of the object.

      • getYPos

        int getYPos()
        Returns the y-coordinate of the location of the object.
        Returns:
        an integer that represents the y-coordinate of the object.

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Returns the vertical width of the size of the object.
        Returns:
        an integer that represents the x-coordinate of the object.

      • getLength

        int getLength()
        Returns the horizontal length of the size of the object.
        Returns:
        an integer that represents the x-coordinate of the object.

      • draw

        void draw(java.awt.Graphics window)
        Draws the object in the specified Graphics context.
        Parameters:
        window - the specified Graphics context.
